sql-script.name: case
sql-script.tran-sql:
prj_site_links
create table prj_site_links ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null default 0, documentid bigint not null default 0, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), createdate datetime not null, status tinyint not null, mark tinyint, buildIn tinyint(1), oorder bigint not null, extend1 varchar(128), extend2 varchar(128), primary key(id), unique (documentid, name), unique (parentid, text) );
